name: Breathe 3D Game Engine
short_description: Using C++, STL, OpenGL, SDL, Box2D and ODE. This project strives for platform independance, code readability and speed. The main target is to provide a convincing driving and physical simulation through the use of ODE at a reasonable frame rate.
